description: Airbnb weakened its policies against extremists and hate groups last year and dissolved its team tasked with removing them from the platform, a former investigations analyst for the company alleged in a recent whistleblower complaint. NBC News' Brandy Zadrozny interviews the whistleblower and reports on what Airbnb is saying in response.
title: Whistleblower says Airbnb weakened its policies on extremists and hate groups
